mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (contactsId, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values (#{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update tbl_contacts set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=CHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactSummary = #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nextContactTime = #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where contactsId = #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select contactsId, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address from tbl_contacts where contactsId = #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR}
